sentences.en: As It'strikes, the cobra holds on tight, ensuring the venom finds its mark.
sentences.cn: 在袭击时, 眼睛王蛇绷紧身体, 以确保毒液找到目标.

sentences.en: Earnshaw burst the door open: having gathered venom with reflection.
sentences.cn: 恩萧把门冲开,显然是经过一番思索之后起了歹心.

sentences.en: He felt as if a serpent had spat venom into his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他感觉就像有一条蛇朝自己的双眼里喷射了毒液。

sentences.en: He lowered his voice and said with venom over his lemon squash.
sentences.cn: 他把声音压低,一边喝柠檬汁一边恶狠狠地说着.

sentences.en: Her voice held a deadly venom.
sentences.cn: 她的声音仍然流露着势不两立的仇恨.

sentences.en: His eyes shone like fire, his body was swollen with venom.
sentences.cn: 它的双眼象火焰似的闪耀, 浑身上下毒液欲滴.

sentences.en: In fact, some components of the venom may benefit human health.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 毒液的某些成分可能有益于人类健康.

sentences.en: She said it quickly and with venom.
sentences.cn: 她说话时语速飞快,而且带着怨恨.

sentences.en: She surveyed him coldly with eyes that spat venom.
sentences.cn: 她冷眼打量着他,眼睛冒出怨毒的凶光.

sentences.en: The snake injects the venom immediately after biting its prey.
sentences.cn: 毒蛇咬住猎物之后马上注入毒液.

sentences.en: The snake uses its venom to stun or paralyze its victims.
sentences.cn: 蛇用其毒液使受害者失去知觉或瘫痪.

sentences.en: The viper paralyses its prey by injecting it with venom.
sentences.cn: 蝰蛇通过注入毒液使猎物麻痹。

sentences.en: There was no mistaking the venom in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的声音中明显透着敌意。

sentences.en: There was real venom in her voice.
Venom and fangs are found in only a quarter of all known snakes.
sentences.cn: 只有四分之一的蛇具有毒液和毒牙.

sentences.en: Venom is produced by modified salivary glands found in the top of the snake's mouth.
sentences.cn: 毒液是蛇口上部的改良的唾液腺分泌的.

words.tran_cn: 有毒的；恶毒的；分泌毒液的；怨恨的
充满恶意地；狠毒地，恶毒地

trans.tran_cn: （某些蛇、蝎子等分泌的）毒液，恶意，<古>毒物
